description.@en: I have medical stigmata on my hands, and these have been present in our family.

data.notes:
Frontier Trait

Professions of this Archetype typically live on the fringes of urban society and in the frontier lands. They make trade off the bounty the land affords them, hiring themselves out as surveyors and protecting others.

effect.@en: Whenever you fail or Critically Fail a Heal Test, spend a Coin to turn it into a Critical Success.
